attributes.action: Giant water bucket contraption to make renewable free energy in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It can help the obesity levels drop in the UK with the exercise to transfer human energy to the UK energy for electricity. It can be a renewable source of energy as all it takes is a few people to lift the bucket to make the water flow down the turbines into energy. We can do this for many days in a month but has to be accessible to most environmentally friendly people. This could be a great way to save the UK some money and a great way to keep the people in the UK to be fit and healthy
attributes.background: So we build a massive bucket to fill with water and lots of people lift the bucket using a long rope. We will then lift the bucket to a big reservoir and pour the water down a tube into the bucket again but on the way down it will spin some turbines to give the UK some more energy.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Developing and deploying renewable energy generators are a matter for energy companies, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase funding for renewable electricity generation, if that's what you want to happen.
